title: Wyze Video Doorbell live view seems broken after most recent firmware update
content:
Owners of the Wyze Video Doorbell should have been dancing on the doorstep with the most recent firmware update. Along with promised fixes and improvements, it enabled the much-anticipated support for both Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. Unfortunately, that seems to have been overshadowed by a pretty serious issue for a video doorbell to have.

The post Wyze Video Doorbell live view seems broken after most recent firmware update appeared first on XDA.
description: A recent firmware upgrade broke the live view on the Wyze Video Doorbell. And an even more recent one didn't fix it, either, it appears.
